description: Interaction constructors for buttons, links, and controls

sprouts.name: sprout-button-base
sprouts.description: Base mixin for buttons with customizable background, color, radius, padding and transitions

sprouts.name: sprout-link-base
sprouts.description: Base mixin for links with customizable color, decoration and transitions

sprouts.name: sprout-control-base
sprouts.description: Base mixin for form controls with size and radius parameters

sprouts.name: sprout-button-sm
sprouts.description: Small size button preset

sprouts.name: sprout-button-md
sprouts.description: Medium size button preset (default)

sprouts.name: sprout-button-lg
sprouts.description: Large size button preset

sprouts.name: sprout-button-primary
sprouts.description: Primary style button with primary background

sprouts.name: sprout-button-secondary
sprouts.description: Secondary style button with secondary background

sprouts.name: sprout-button-ghost
sprouts.description: Ghost style button with transparent background

sprouts.name: sprout-button-outline
sprouts.description: Outline style button with border and transparent background

sprouts.name: sprout-button-danger
sprouts.description: Danger style button with danger background

sprouts.name: sprout-button-success
sprouts.description: Success style button with success background

sprouts.name: sprout-button-full
sprouts.description: Full width button preset

sprouts.name: sprout-button-icon
sprouts.description: Icon button with square dimensions and full border radius

sprouts.name: sprout-button-floating
sprouts.description: Floating action button positioned fixed at bottom right

sprouts.name: sprout-link-primary
sprouts.description: Primary colored link

sprouts.name: sprout-link-secondary
sprouts.description: Secondary colored link

sprouts.name: sprout-link-muted
sprouts.description: Muted colored link with no initial decoration

sprouts.name: sprout-link-button
sprouts.description: Link styled as a button with background hover effects

sprouts.name: sprout-control-checkbox
sprouts.description: Custom styled checkbox control

sprouts.name: sprout-control-radio
sprouts.description: Custom styled radio control

sprouts.name: sprout-control-toggle
sprouts.description: Custom styled toggle switch control

sprouts.name: sprout-button-group
sprouts.description: Button group layout with connected borders

sprouts.name: sprout-link-list
sprouts.description: Vertical link list with separators
